author: vors
body:
- Incorporate build.FullCLR.ps1 in PowerShellGitHubDev.psm1 
- Remove build.ps1
- Update documentation

comments.author: vors
comments.body: I squashed some commits and magically it wiped your comments.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: You should see "andschwa discussed an outdated diff about 2 hours ago. Show conversation" with that last part as a link. They're not wiped :smile:

comments.author: vors
comments.body: sure, I grep for it, but missed readme somehow

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Hey @vors I'm going to bump the CLI versions to test if the regression still exists. If it all works out, I'll rebase this and merge.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I've seen a half-dozen AppVeyor runs pass in a row, I think the new version is good to go.

title: Incorporate build.FullCLR.ps1 in PowerShellGitHubDev.psm1
